tool_description: Extract essential metadata from web pages, specifically focusing on Open Graph tags. With this API, you can easily integrate Open Graph scraping capabilities into your applications, platforms, or services, enabling you to retrieve valuable information for search engine optimization (SEO), social media sharing, or content analysis.
name: SEO Open Graph Scraper
title: SEO Open Graph Scraper

api_list.name: Scrape SEO
api_list.description: Scrape SEO from provided web address
